alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 10:16PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM AKDT WEDNESDAY ALONG THE KUSKOKWIM RIVER NEAR KALSKAG... ...REPLACES FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...The Kuskokwim River near Kalskag. * WHEN...Until 700 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is ongoing in Kalskag, with water over numerous roads, including the road to the airport and at the school, and under numerous homes. Other low lying areas may experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1000 PM AKDT, The River Watch Team reports high water in Kalskag due to nearby ice jams along the Kuskokwim River. The main break up front is downstream of Lower Kalskag. Water levels continue to slowly rise in both the Kuskokwim River and surrounding sloughs. Flooding is expected to continue until the ice jam releases. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
